name: Imperial War Machine
Lore: 'Absolute control wielded by the Emperor enables Imperial forces to dominate planetary systems before the Rebel Alliance can gain a foothold.',
Text: 'Deploy on table.  Imperial pilots are not restricted (•••).  Once per turn, may reveal a non-unique Imperial pilot from hand to take a non-unique AT-AT (of armor > 6), Victory-class Star Destroyer, or Dreadnaught, (or vice versa) into hand from Reserve Deck and deploy both simultaneously; reshuffle. (Immune to Alter.)',
